documents.document: @tuuliel I think that probably nails what has happened and a good way of describing it
@michaelhoffman @tuuliel tbh think they are making it up as they go, keeping my fingers crossed for upcoming trip with my Arabic surname ðŸ˜•
@tuuliel ...let's face it, we all know ban *is* anti-Muslim, but shd be decried while still not inventing facts - historians shd know better
@tuuliel would depend if other non-muslims, who haven't been made stateless, also receive same exemption...
@tuuliel ...and post-2003 legislation that returned citizenship to Iraqi exiles specifically excluded Jews
@tuuliel also Arab-born Jews bit of a special case -e.g. my knowledge from family is Iraqi-born Israelis, who left Iraq stateless...
@tuuliel no idea but would like to see altfacts eliminated from all sides, so we can have moral authority when criticising the sinister ones
